songs.title: Your Love
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Jade Thirlwall]
Luxurious lovin' like Egyptian cotton
If I ain't got nothin', least I got you
Highway with the top down, a milli in the bank account
It ain't what I got, but, it's what you do

[Pre-Chorus: Jesy Nelson]
Deeper than oceans, as sweet as devotion, it's all I need
You pull me close and there's no way that I can describe
What your love make me feel like, oh

[Chorus: Jesy Nelson & All]
Your love make me feel like, oh
Your love make me feel like, oh
Dirty dancing in the moonlight
That's what your love make me feel like, oh
Your love make me feel like, oh
Your love make me feel like, oh
Come and kiss me like the first time
That's what your love make me feel like

[Verse 2: Leigh-Anne Pinnock]
Late up on Sunday, ain't workin' on Monday
Let's pack up and run away, just me and you
Come closer 'cause I want it all over my body
Boy, there ain't no heartache you can't undo

[Pre-Chorus: Perrie Edwards]
Deeper than oceans, as sweet as devotion, it's all I need
You pull me close and there's no way that I can describe
What your love make me feel like, oh

[Chorus: Perrie Edwards with Jesy Nelson & All]
Your love make me feel like, oh
Your love make me feel like, oh
Dirty dancing in the moonlight
That's what your love make me feel like, oh
Your love make me feel like, oh
Your love make me feel like, oh
Come and kiss me like the first time
That's what your love make me feel like

[Post-Chorus: Perrie Edwards, Leigh-Anne Pinnock & Perrie Edwards + All]
Your love, your love, your love, your love
Your love, your love, your love, your love
Your love, your love, your love, your love
That's what your love make me feel like
Your love, your love, your love, your love
Your love, your love, your love, your love
Your love, your love, your love, your love

[Bridge: Leigh-Anne Pinnock & All]
Like, woah, if you know you're in love
And it feel like the one
Then put 'em up, put 'em up in the sky, make me sing again
Woah, you're the one that I need
Take my hand baby, please
Then put 'em up, put 'em up in the sky, make me sing again
Your love make me feel like
Your love make me feel like
Your love make me feel like

[Chorus: Perrie Edwards with All, Jesy Nelson, Jade Thirlwall]
Your love make me feel like, oh
Your love make me feel like, oh (Ahh)
Dirty dancing in the moonlight
That's what your love make me feel like
Your love make me feel like, oh (Ooh, woah)
Your love make me feel like, oh
Come and kiss me like the first time
That's what your love make me feel like, oh

[Post-Chorus: Perrie Edwards, All, Jade Thirlwall & Leigh-Anne Pinnock]
Your love, your love, your love, your love, oh (If you know, you're in love)
Your love, your love, your love, your love, oh (And it feel like the one)
Your love, your love, your love, your love, oh (Yeah, baby) (Your love, oh)
Your love (Oh, woah), your love, your love, your love
Your love (Oh, woah), your love, your love, your love
Your love (Oh, woah), your love, your love, your love
Your love, your love, your love
